import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { setAmount } from "../redux/actions/salBuyAction" import { useState } from "react" import { saveB } from "../redux/actions/buyAction" export const Sal = () => { const ds=useDispatch() const prod = useSelector(k => k.datareducerS.product) const currnt=useSelector(u=>u.datareducercu.currntCuc) const finish=()=>{const objj={ CusCode:currnt.id, Date:Date(), all:prod } saveB(objj).the } return <> {prod.map((x, i) => ( ))}
קוד שם כמות מחיר
{x._id} {x.GameName} {x.Count1} {(x.Count1*x.Price)}
}
